message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand your position, Bob, but the value of this product is quite high. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I'm still thinking that $12,000 is a fair price for the product. I'm willing to go up to $12,500, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. Can you meet me there?
